Package sorcer.core.dispatch

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DispatcherFactory
    This interface must be implemented by all factory classes used to create instances of subclasses of Dispatcher.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BlockThread  
    CatalogBlockDispatcher
    A dispatching class for exertion blocks in the PUSH mode.
    CatalogExertDispatcher  
    CatalogParallelDispatcher  
    CatalogSequentialDispatcher  
    ExertDispatcher  
    ExertionDispatcherFactory
    This class creates instances of appropriate subclasses of Dispatcher.
    ExertionSorter
    SORCER class User: Pawel Rubach Date: 23.10.13 Sort a list of exertions taking into account the dependencies in pipes and the tasks and jobs hierarchy.
    JobThread  
    ProviderProvisionManager  
    ProvisionManager
    The ProviderProvisionManager handles the dynamic creation of OperationalStrings created from Exertions.
    SpaceParallelDispatcher  
    SpaceSequentialDispatcher  
    SpaceTaskDispatcher  
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    DispatcherException  
    SortingException
    The SortingException is thrown when the ExertionSorter finds a problem with the Flow or the dependencies in the analyzed job
